#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,n,i,a,b,x,y,count;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		cin>>a>>b;
		count=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			cin>>x>>y;
			count=count+abs(a-x)+abs(b-y);
		}
		cout<<2*count<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
